title: ricinx
author: ricinx
content: Hi Guys, our project Pactus. Lowest entry of mining and staking.Our consensus use less than 1% CPU resources. Just any old PC can run a node.Tutorial how to set up node>>]https://medium.com/@admin_11930/how-to-run-a-node-on-pactus-network-2152265c22de]Now we are in Testnet1 and TestPAC for your node validator. Airdrop will given on Mainnet. >> ]https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfJ-uiNQtGZdqdApwOCU9oF_O2qAVVa2P2EJtLJvKHxvjQhpQ/viewform]Please have a look and comment to us. Your voice help us growth.https://pactus.org/

comments.author: ricinx
comments.body: Important announcement: Conclusion of First CampaignDear Pactus Community,First and foremost, we would like to express our deepest gratitude to all of you. Your remarkable engagement and dedication towards Pactus Blockchain has been truly inspiring.Within less than two months, we have successfully onboarded 500 validators, a significant milestone that we are truly proud to announce. This level of dedication and enthusiasm demonstrates the strength of our expanding community and the potential of the Pactus blockchain.Despite this incredible progress, we're not ready for the Mainnet launch yet. It's a complex process, and we prioritize getting things right over rushing them. many important development tasks to complete, including Soft and Hard fork tests essential for the stability and security of our blockchain network.Additionally, While our community has already grown significantly, we plan to reinforce it even more. A strong, active community is vital to the success of any decentralized network.Now, announce our second campaign for initial staking on the Mainnet launch. We encourage everyone to join the Testnet as a validator until October 1st. We will randomly select 100 validators to receive 40 PAC for initial staking at the Mainnet launch. This lottery is based on the block hashes, ensuring full transparency and open for examination. We will soon share the list of validators eligible for the first campaign, who will each receive 80 PAC for initial staking on the Mainnet launch.Thank you once again for your support and belief in Pactus. Together, we will build a better future for blockchain technology and decentralized networks.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: FsJsxy on July 21, 2023, 05:59:13 PMHi.So lets begin mine Pactus from CPU.1) Download miner support CPU (scam link)2) Create bat file and edit him next code, like:Code:@echo offcd %~dp0clsAresProject.exe --disable-gpu --algorithm "algo" --pool "pool:port" --wallet "wallet_address" --gpu-boost 3pause3)Save and run miner.Never download miners on forums and other sources without checking on the official website of the project.Official github of the projecthttps://github.com/pactus-project/pactushttps://pactus.org/download/There is no reference to the virus in the quote, moderators, please do not delete this reminder to new members.
